#labels Featured
1. Your Droid must be rooted, if it isn't follow these directions.
   http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=597175

2. You need to have busybox installed so that you can copy tun.ko to the correct location. If you don't, try this:
   http://alldroid.org/viewtopic.php?f=210&t=792&sid=0434b8057ca181ae1bdaa1e0c0c42b2e

   or install it manually:
   http://alldroid.org/viewtopic.php?f=210&t=603&sid=0434b8057ca181ae1bdaa1e0c0c42b2e

3. Copy tun.ko from your SD card to /system/lib/modules/
   - Copy tun.ko to your SD card
   - Using either adb or a terminal emulator run:
       # su
       # mount -o remount,rw /system
       # cp /sdcard/tun.ko /system/lib/modules/
       # mount -o remount,ro /system

4. Install VPN_Connections_v096.apk or newer.

-- The "tun.ko" module and instructions were contributed by Jon Tomaszewski

*** Make sure to read the comments below. You need the right version of busybox and have it install the symlinks.
